description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to Color ! A very fast game, that will strain your dexterity !!  Play 3 different game style in 2 mode (arcade and survival), alone or with your friends and compare your scores with more than 140 different statistics!   Challenge yourself by collecting  the 16 game medals !
